short_summary: General Officer ive role to AC Administrative general Officer
full_summary:
# GENERAL OFFICER / FLAG OFFICER SYNCHRONOUS LEARNING EVENT - GUEST SPEAKER ENQUIRY

## Business Opportunity

The Canadian Defence Academy invites proposals from qualified subject-matter experts to deliver a synchronous learning event for General/Flag Officers (G/FOs) on critical and rare earth minerals in the Canadian Arctic.

### Service Requirements

The successful contractor will provide expertise to facilitate an in-person or virtual synchronous learning event, including:

* Presenting on critical and rare earth minerals in the Canadian Arctic
* Discussing the importance of this matter to the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF)
* Addressing the strategic implications for the CAF

### Eligibility Criteria

* The contractor must have relevant expertise in critical and rare earth minerals
* The contractor must have experience in delivering learning events to senior military personnel
* The contractor must be able to adapt their content to meet the needs of the G/FO audience

### Bidding Process

* Bidders must submit a proposal in response to this Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Proposals must be received by 2023-11-27T17:00:00
* The selection process will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price

### Additional Information

* The Canadian Defence Academy is committed to employment equity and diversity in the workplace
* The successful contractor will be required to contribute to this commitment

## Important Dates

* Tender closing: 2023-11-27T17:00:00
* Expected contract start date: 2023-12-04
* Expected contract end date: 2023-12-08

## Contact Information

* Jameson Wood, Procurement Officer
* Email: [Jameson.Wood@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Jameson.Wood@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 422-4789

## Attachments

Attachments in English and French can be downloaded from [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25201/w4938-23-160s-cover-page.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25201/w4938-23-160s-cover-page.pdf) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25201/w4938-23-160s-rfp_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default
